name: Nasta Suites & Villa Intentional Living Mykonos
description: Situated in Mýkonos City, 1.4 km from Panormos Beach, Nasta Suites & Villa Intentional Living Mykonos features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Each accommodation at the 5-star hotel has mountain views, and guests can enjoy access to a restaurant and to a bar. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. Rooms come with a kettle, while certain rooms are equipped with a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. At Nasta Suites & Villa Intentional Living Mykonos the rooms have bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and vegetarian options. The accommodation offers a hot tub. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire and car hire are available at Nasta Suites & Villa Intentional Living Mykonos. Agios Sostis Beach is 2.2 km from the hotel, while Mykonos Windmills is 5.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 4 km from Nasta Suites & Villa Intentional Living Mykonos.

name: Santa Marina, a Luxury Collection Resort, Mykonos
description: Experience the mesmerizing magic of Santa Marina, a Luxury Collection Resort, Mykonos. Our luxury beach resort is just 10 minutes from the airport and town, Santa Marina makes it easy to explore all the island’s must-see attractions – then return to our sanctuary of authentic Aegean beauty at Ornos Bay. Choose from 102 guest rooms and suites, along with 13 villas featuring two to seven bedrooms. Beach-chic interiors offer modern, natural luxury, opening to balconies with hypnotic Aegean views. Discover the only private sandy beach on Mykonos, gorgeous infinity pools, the international-caliber Ginkgo Spa and four options for dining and drinks, highlighted by the world’s first ever Buddha-Bar Beach. Our Santa Marina resort invites you to savour the glamorous lifestyle of Mykonos in the island’s most fashionable and sophisticated setting.Marriott

name: Myconian Imperial - Leading Hotels Of The World
description: The 5-star Myconian Imperial - Leading Hotels of the World boasts stunning views of the Aegean Sea and a private beach area. It includes spa facilities, gourmet cuisine, hot tub and 3 swimming pools. Free WiFi is available in all areas. All air-conditioned rooms of Myconian Imperial have modern décor and balconies with superb views of Elia Beach. They are equipped with an LCD satellite TV, DVD/CD player and safety box. Some feature outdoor hot tubs or private pools. A rich American breakfast is offered at Meltemi. Fine Mediterranean dishes are served at the Celebrities a la carte restaurant. Guests also have the choice of 2 cocktail bars and a beach bar. Mykonos Airport is around 10 km away from the resort. The picturesque town of Mykonos with whitewashed, Cycladic-style houses, bars and shops is less than a 20-minute drive away.

name: Kamari Hotel
description: Kamari hotel is located just a few meters from the beach of Platys Gialos, on the south western side of Mykonos. The nearby Psarou Beach and Paradise Beach offer more options of sparking waters and sandy beaches. Recreational amenities at Kamari Hotel include an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and a children's pool. Other amenities include complimentary breakfast, a bar/lounge, and a poolside bar. All Kamari Mykonos hotel rooms, are air-conditioned and include TVs. Rooms also include refrigerators and hair dryers and enjoy a balcony or a veranda with a sea, pool or garden view. Hotel Kamari provides an airport shuttle. The property has a 24-hour front desk. Onsite parking is complimentary. A frequent service bus stop is situated right in front of the hotel, ensuring easy access to the town.

name: Sea View Residence
description: Just 1.5 km from the famous beaches of Ornos and Agios Ioannis, the traditionally built Sea View Apartments features a pool and hot tub. It offers accommodation with free Wi-Fi and furnished balcony overlooking the Aegean Sea. An LCD TV and fridge are included in all the air-conditioned units at the Sea View Apartments. Some accommodation types feature a kitchenette or kitchen with cooking facilities and a dining area. Mykonos International Airport is 4 km away, while the scenic town of Mykonos is at 4.5 km. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Maki's Place
address: Tourlos Mykonos Tourlos Mykonos Mykonos Island 846 00, Tourlos 846 00
description: Overlooking the new port of Mykonos and located just 5 minutes from Agios Stefanos Beach, Makis Place features a bar-restaurant and a swimming pool with sun terrace. The Cycladic-style guest house offers free Wi-Fi in its public areas. Set amidst a lush garden, the air-conditioned units of Makis have beamed ceilings and are decorated with wooden furnishings. Each comes with a TV and a private bathroom with shower. Some units enjoy views over the Aegean Sea. A continental breakfast is served daily at the outdoor breakfast area, while guests can also enjoy Mediterranean flavours and refreshing cocktails at the elegant bar-restaurant. Makis Place is situated 2 km from the cosmopolitan capital of Mykonos and 4.5 km from Mykonos Airport. Troulos Beach is 200 metres from the property. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: The Majestic Hotel
description: Situated over the dramatic Santorini cliffs, The Majestic Hotel features soundproofed rooms with private balcony enjoying views of the Aegean Sea or the volcano. It lies within 400 metres from Fira centre and just a few metres from the Caldera. The Majestic Hotel offers various accommodation types all with marble bathrooms with spa bath and verandas offering astounding views. Each room is equipped with air conditioning, flat-screen TV, free Wi-Fi internet. Hotel facilities include 3 fresh water swimming pools from which one is heated. A 24-hour front desk is available. At the Beauty Hall, guests may choose among several facial and body treatments, massage, Turkish bath, sauna or aromatherapy. The Capparis a-la carte restaurant serves rich breakfast every morning. The Crocus Restaurant offers an interesting wine list along with gourmet dishes prepared with seasonal products from the company’s organic farm.

name: Kalisti Hotel & Suites
description: Conveniently located in the heart of Fira Town, just metres from the Caldera, the Cycladic-style Kalisti Hotel & Suites features modern facilities with deluxe services. Set amidst a 2,500m² garden, the modern hotel offers a pool with a sun-lounger terrace and an outdoor hot tub. The elegantly decorated rooms and suites at Kalisti offer views of the sea, garden or pool and come with free WiFi and satellite TV. The bathrooms are fitted with forged cement and are stocked with a hairdryer, slippers and luxurious toiletries. A minibar comes standard. Greek & Santorinian Breakfast with free espresso can be enjoyed daily until 11:00 a.m. Pergola pool bar serves snacks, refreshing juices, drinks and cocktails throughout the day. The lively centre of Fira Town, where bars, clubs and shops are featured, is round the corner. Kalisti Luxury Hotel & Suites is 5 km from Santorini Airport and 6 km Athinios Port. The hotel is served by taxis and buses, which stop only 200 metres away.

name: Alizea Villas & Suites
description: Featuring a pool, the Cycladic-style Villa Alizea is just 650 metres from the centre of Fira in Santorini. Free WiFi is provided in all areas. Each of the air-conditioned rooms at Alizea Villa has a flat-screen TV and a fridge. All rooms include a private, furnished balcony while some feature Aegean Sea views. Guests can relax at the sun loungers by the pool or in the garden. Staff at the reception desk can arrange car, scooter and atv rentals, cruises and private tours. It also offers information on restaurants and bars. Consisting of 3 separate buildings, the Alizea is located 15 km from the famous Black Beach of Kamari. Santorini Airport is 9 km away and Athinios Port lies within 12 km.

name: Andronis Concept Wellness Resort
description: Situated on a hillside position with stunning views over the Mediterranean Sea, Andronis Concept Wellness Resort is peacefully set in Imerovigli. Facing the endless view on the Aegean sunset and the volcano, all minimal suites at Andronis Concept Wellness Resort all luxurious and minimal feature bright and comfortable interiors. Each features its own private swimming pool overlooking the azure Aegean Sea. All suites boast a living room with a flat-screen, satellite TV. Each includes a private bathroom. A variety of Spa treatments, yoga classes and personal training services can be enjoyed. Guests may also taste local recipes at the on site restaurant. Fira, the cosmopolitan capital of Santorini, is 11 km away. Santorini (Thira) Airport is 6 km away.

name: El Greco Resort
description: Offering an adults-only spa centre, El Greco is conveniently located minutes from the centre of Fira. It boasts 5 outdoor pools, 1 indoor pool, a children’s pool and 2 open-air tubs with hydromassage facilities. Conference facilities are also available. Each air-conditioned room reflects the traditional Cycladic style and features a mini fridge, satellite TV and balcony or terrace. Guests can start their day with an American buffet breakfast, while Greek and local dishes can be enjoyed for lunch or dinner at La Pergola restaurant. Coffee, refreshing beverages and cocktails are served at the poolside bar. The 24-hour reception can arrange excursions and boat trips, car rentals and currency exchange services. Free WiFi is available throughout. Santorini's beautiful sandy beaches are within easy reach from the hotel, Monolithos at 7 km, Kamari at 12 km and Perissa at 14 km away.

name: Dome Santorini Resort & Spa
description: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Imerovigli, Dome Santorini Resort promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. To be found at the hotel are free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, fax machine, express check-in/check-out, luggage storage. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as complimentary tea, closet, towels, clothes rack, slippers. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include hot tub, outdoor pool, massage, garden. Dome Santorini Resort is an excellent choice from which to explore Santorini or to simply relax and rejuvenate.priceline.com

name: Royal Sun Hotel
description: Featuring a restaurant and a pool with sun terrace amidst its palm-tree garden, Royal Sun lies within 3 km from the centre of Chania Town. It offers air-conditioned accommodation with free Wi-Fi and a private balcony overlooking the Cretan Sea and the town. Fitted with floor-to-ceiling windows, the rooms of Royal Sun are decorated with green-wooden furniture and soft colours. Each unit is equipped with LCD satellite TV, a safe and a fridge. A hairdryer and free toiletries can be found in the private bathroom. A buffet breakfast is served daily at the dining area, while guests can also enjoy Greek and Mediterranean dishes at the on-site restaurant. Coffees, refreshing drinks and cocktails are served at the lounge bar throughout the day. Sport facilities include a fitness centre. Staff at the front desk can arrange car rental. Royal Sun is situated 6 km from Souda Port and 12 km from Chania International Airport. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can offer information on the scenic Venetian Port of Chania at 3 km. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Flamingos Hotel Apartments
description: With garden views, Flamingos Hotel Apartments is located in Kato Daratso and has room service, bar, garden, year-round outdoor pool and children's playground. Free WiFi is provided. Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchenette, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some units include a seating area and/or a terrace. Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy a buffet breakfast. A car rental service is available at Flamingos Apartments. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Glaros Beach, Iguana Beach and Yannis Beach. The nearest airport is Chania International, 19 km from Flamingos Hotel Apartments, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Stellina Village
description: Situated in Kato Daratso in the Crete region and Chryssi Akti reachable within 200 metres, Stellina Village features accommodation with free WiFi, a children's playground, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and free private parking. All self-catered units feature tiled floors and are fitted with a flat-screen TV, a safety deposit box, an equipped kitchenette with a fridge, and a private bathroom with shower. Some units have a terrace and/or a balcony with sea or pool views. The restaurant at the aparthotel specialises in local cuisine. The wellness area at Stellina Village is comprised of a beauty services and a fitness centre. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Stellina Village include Kladissos Beach, Yannis Beach and Nea Chora Beach. The nearest airport is Chania International, 16 km from the aparthotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Kedrissos Hotel
description: Featuring a 150m2 pool with separate children’s section, Kedrissos Hotel consists of self-catering accommodation with free Wi-Fi. The bar-restaurant comes with indoor and outdoor area. The beaches of Aptera and Chrissi Akti are 500 metres away. Decorated in soft colours, all air-conditioned apartments open to a balcony with mountain view. Each comes with a kitchenette or kitchen to prepare a breakfast or light meal. A TV and private bathroom are included. Kedrissos Hotel lies 2 km from the scenic town of Chania and 9 km from Souda Port. Daskalogiannis International Airport is at a distance of 15 km. Free on-site parking is available.

name: Yakinthos Hotel
address: Irakli Avgoula Street 1 - Agii Apostoli, Chania
description: Located west of Chania, this hotel is on the route to Agia Marina-Platanias and is only 40 metres from the magnificent sandy beaches of Glaros and Agii Apostoli. The Nikolidakis family have run the hotel for the past 9 years with much success, offering a comfortable, warm atmosphere only found in such small, family-run hotels. This hotel offers an ideal solution for those people who want to enjoy their stay away from the crowds, yet remain close to the sights and hot spots of Chania. The hotel is 18 km from Chania Airport and 10 km from the Souda fairgrounds. We offer a lavish buffet breakfast and 39 air-conditioned rooms, all comfortable and well-equipped to create a relaxing atmosphere. All guests are offered a free welcome drink.

name: Sirios Village Hotel
description: Located 4 km away from the centre of Chania, Sirios Village Hotel & Bungalows features an extensive pool area and a tennis court set within lush gardens. It offers accommodation with balcony, and it is 300 metres from the beach. Sirios rooms and apartments are bright and tastefully furnished. They are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV and hairdryer. Some units enjoy views to the Cretan Sea, while others have a hot tub. Guests can enjoy traditional Cretan cuisine at the hotel’s buffet restaurant. There is also an a la carte restaurant offering a wide wine selection. Sirios bar is ideal for an evening cocktail by the pool. Chania International Airport is 14 km away from the hotel. The seaside town of Platanias is within a 10-minute drive. Free private on-site parking is possible and free WiFi is available throughout.

name: Dore Hotel
description: Situated 250 metres from the seaside area of Agia Marina, Dore Boutique Hotel offers accommodation with a TV. It features a swimming pool with children's area, a pool bar and a restaurant. Dore Boutique Hotel rooms are tastefully decorated, air conditioned and open to a balcony, most with views over the Cretan Sea. They have a safety deposit box, a coffee maker and a private bathroom with shower. The hotel’s restaurant serves buffet breakfast and dinner, traditional Greek cuisine and snacks. Dore Boutique Hotel also has a bar offering coffees, drinks and cocktails. The picturesque city of Chania is 9 km away, while Souda Port is at 16 km and Chania Airport at 31 km. Wi-Fi access and on-site parking are provided free of charge.

name: Domes Zeen Chania, a Luxury Collection Resort, Crete
description: At Domes Zeen we emphasize community, sustainability, and slow living in an elegant setting. Nestled in a protected cove, a short drive from the Town of Chania, and offering spectacular views of the town and the sea, Domes Zeen is a destination in itself. We create the ultimate sensation of togetherness right in the heart of your Cretan sanctuary. Immerse yourself in a gourmet dining experience surrounded by the splendor of nature. Retreat to your private villa for restful moments on your private terrace or balcony before falling asleep under the stars to the silence of nature. This is your Domes Zeen experience, designed to awaken all senses.Marriott

name: Hotel Christina
description: With a stunning location right on Chania’s beachfront, Hotel Christina features sea-view rooms and has a 2,000-m² garden that leads right to the beach. The 2-star resort has an outdoor heated pool and a children’s pool. The self-catered studios are elegantly furnished and feature a kitchenette equipped with kitchenware and fridge. They are air conditioned, and include a satellite TV, safe and direct dial telephone. Wi-Fi is free throughout the premises. Guests can enjoy relaxed moments on the beach, and sun beds and umbrellas are available to hire. Snacks are available at the beach bar. Just a 10-minute walk from Chania’s centre, Christina Hotel is ideally based for relaxation, as well as sightseeing.

name: Areti Suites
description: Featuring modernly decorated rooms and a snack bar, Areti Suites is surrounded by a well-tended garden, 2 km from Kalathas Beach. Complimentary Wi-Fi is provided. All air-conditioned rooms are fitted with upholstered beds in bright colours, wallpapers and hypo-allergic mattresses and linens. Opening to a balcony with garden or mountain views, each includes a minibar and flat-screen TV. The private bathroom offers a shower with hydromassage panel, a hairdryer and slippers. Areti Suites is located 2 km from Chania International Airport and 10 km from Souda Port. Staff can arrange car rental to explore the main town of Chania with the Venetian Harbour, at 8 km. Free bicycles and on-site parking are available.

name: Lena Beach Hotel
description: Lena Beach Hotel offers an outdoor swimming pool and rooms with a balcony overlooking the Aegean Sea. It is located only 50 metres from the beach of Kalatha and 100 metres from bars and restaurants. All air-conditioned rooms include a TV with satellite channels, fridge and a bathroom with shower and bath. Free Wi-Fi is offered throughout. Guests can relax at the bar or the pool. Alternatively, they can visit the town of Chania, with its Venetian fortress, 12 km from Hotel Lena Beach. Chania International Airport is 8 km away. The property offers free parking on site.

name: Athina Beach Hotel
description: Built on the seaside resort of Agii Apostoli, the modern hotel Athina Beach offers a pool with adjacent bar and sun-lounger terrace. It is only 3 km from Chania Town. Athina Beach offers self-catered studios and apartments, complete with satellite LCD TV. In-room wired and wireless internet is free, as well as the use of air conditioning. All units include a well-equipped kitchenette with fridge. Safety box is available upon surcharge. There are shops and restaurants within walking distance. A pine tree park separates the hotel from 3 beaches, just 300 metres away. The surrounding area is fully developed with super markets and traditional taverns. Free public parking is possible.

name: Alexandros Studios
description: This apartment complex stands 4.5 km from Chania city on a hillside overlooking the sea and Kalamaki beach, one of the most beautiful places on the island. The tastefully decorated and modern accommodation features a cosy atmosphere and every room includes a kitchenette. All rooms enjoy direct access to the garden or balcony with sea views. Guests can start their day with the continental breakfast. The complex is set in a natural environment of extensive gardens with an outdoor swimming pool. The beach is only 200 metres away and there is a regular bus service into town where you can visit the picturesque harbour. The residence is also near the motorway, providing easy access to the surrounding area.

name: Isida Hotel
description: Set in Agia Marina Nea Kydonias, Isida Hotel Agia Marina features a fitness centre and a garden. Each accommodation at the 3-star hotel has garden views, and guests can enjoy access to a terrace and to a shared lounge. The property features a children's playground. At the hotel rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a seating area, 2 flat-screen TVs with satellite channels, a kitchenette, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer and a bath. Isida Hotel Agia Marina offers some units with sea views, and every room includes a balcony. All guest rooms will provide guests with a desk and a coffee machine. A continental breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Chania Town is 10 km from the accommodation, while Georgioupolis is 47 km from the property. The nearest airport is Chania International Airport, 24 km from Isida Hotel Agia Marina.

name: Marika Hotel
description: Offering sea-view studios, Marika Hotel is situated directly on Platania’s beachfront. Highlights include an outdoor pool with a pool bar restaurant by the sea and an Italian restaurant. The resort’s busy center is only 200 meters from the hotel. Guests can enjoy the breakfast buffet that is served by the sea. Snacks and drinks are available on the poolside. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. Marika Hotel’s cafe bar also features a wide-screen TV for your entertainment. Platanias is located in west Crete, just 11 km west of Chania. Guests of the Marika also benefit from free parking on-site.

name: Avra Imperial Hotel
description: Built within 65,000 m² of gardens, Avra Imperial Hotel features a 1,500-m² pool area with a pool bar in the middle. The resort is 100 metres from Kolimvari Beach. The ultramodern guest rooms have a large bathroom with a tub and a shower, and are fitted with parquet floors. A flat-screen TV with cable and satellite channels and free Wi-Fi are standard. Some rooms have a private or shared pool, or a spacious terrace with hot tub. The Avra Imperial Hotel offers 3 swimming pools, including a freshwater children’s pool. The spa offers 10 massage rooms and a beauty salon. A state-of-the-art gym, steam room, Finnish sauna and indoor pool are available. Breakfast, lunch and dinner are served at the main restaurant offering a pool-facing terrace. Guests can sample traditional Cretan, Italian and international dishes at the hotel’s 4 à la carte restaurants. Room service is available. The hotel is a 2-minute walk to the centre of Kolimvari and 23 km west of Chania. The hotel is 35 km from Chania International Airport. The famous Samaria gorge is a 40-minute drive (58 km).

name: Elma's Dream Apartments & Villas
description: Just 100 metres from the crystal clear waters of Chrisi Akti Beach, Elma’s Dream offers a quiet retreat with a swimming pool, with special section for children, a restaurant and a poolside bar. Elma’s Dream offers comfortably furnished studios and apartments, each with spacious seating area, equipped kitchenette with refrigerator, mini oven and coffee machine. They all have a balcony and some of them share a big terrace as well. Elma’s Dream is perfectly located 3.5km from Chania’s centre, 15km from the airport and 7km from the port. The bus stop is just 50m away.

name: Creta Vitalis
description: Only 8 km from Chania Town, family-run Creta Vitalis enjoys a quiet location 400 metres from the beach, in the resort of Kalathas. It is surrounded by Mediterranean garden, and its swimming pool faces the sea and the scenic bay. Most rooms have a balcony with sea view. Each has air conditioning, a TV, telephone, fridge and hairdryer. For longer stays or guests who just prefer home comforts, the apartments and bungalows have kitchen facilities. You can enjoy refreshing drinks on the terrace, while admiring the ever-changing colours of the horizon. The nearby restaurants serve famous Cretan dishes and fresh fish. Extending over 10,000 m2 of land, Creta Vitalis is 9 km from Souda Port and just 6 km from Ioannis Daskalogiannis Airport.

name: New Kydonia Suites & Studios
address: Kon/os Kalaitzis St, Daratsos, PO Box 87, Nea Kydonia, Chania
description: Located in Kato Daratso, 1.6 km from Glaros Beach, New Kydonia Suites & Studios provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. The property is around 1.7 km from Iguana Beach, 2 km from Kalamaki Beach and 2.4 km from Municipal Garden. The hotel has a children's playground and city views, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar. At the hotel each room has air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchenette, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. New Kydonia Suites & Studios features certain rooms with mountain views, and each room includes a balcony. At the accommodation rooms come with bed linen and towels. A continental, Full English/Irish or vegetarian breakfast is available daily at the property. The area is popular for snorkelling and cycling, in addition, bike hire and car hire are available at this hotel. Fransiscan Monastery of Agios Fragkiskos is 2.4 km from New Kydonia Suites & Studios, while Municipal Art Gallery of Chania is 4.9 km away. The nearest airport is Chania International Airport, 18 km from the hotel.

name: Cathrin Suites
description: Cathrine Suites is set in the historic Acrotiri, only a 2-minute walk from the beach of Zorbas. It offers self-catering accommodation, a pool with children’s section and a garden with barbeque corner. The spacious rooms at Cathrine Suites have kitchenette facilities and coffee makers. They all enjoy beautiful sea views from their large windows and private balconies. Free Wi-Fi is also available. A welcome basket with local honey, fruits, wine and locally produced tsikoudia is offered upon arrival. Cathrin Suites’ reception is available 24-7 and may provide guests with safety boxes, or make car rental arrangements. Cathrin Suites is 8 km from Chania Airport and 12 km from Chania centre and Souda Bay.

name: Oscar Suites & Village
description: No description found

name: Elizabeth Suites
description: Esteemed guests are welcome to relax in a quite and elegant setting. Beautiful twofloor suites with one bedroom, kitchen equipment bathroom with tab, livingroom and excellent sea view are only some of the benefits that we offer. The suites are located 4 km from the town of Chania and the traditional old harbour and 8 km from Souda port. Nearby you will find restaurants, supermarkets, coffee shops, and shopping malls.The suites offer free wifi connection, tv with DVD and air condition. In the building you will also find swimming pool and jaccuzi with eight seats. The "Elizabeth Suites" promises to make your stay in Chania relaxing and unforgettable.VRBO

name: Minos Village
address: Agia Marina, 73 014 Chania Crete, Agia Marina
description: Offering a pool and a restaurant, Minos Village is in the beach resort of Agia Marina. It features self-catering accommodation with balcony or terrace. Free WiFi is available in public areas. Agia Marina Beach is a short walk away. Apartments at Minos Village have a TV and air conditioning.There is a full a kitchenette with a microwave and a refrigerator. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. You can enjoy garden view from the room. At Minos Village you will find a garden, a terrace with sun loungers and a bar. Other facilities like a ticket service, a tour desk and luggage storage are offered. The property offers free, private parking. The property is approximately 10 km from the scenic town of Chania and a short walk to the sea front. Souda Airport is located 19 km from the accommodation.

name: Sun City
description: In the attractive area of Agii Apostoli, Kato Daratso, you will be in an ideal spot to explore the beauties of the island, immediately surrounded by stillness and serenity. With a warm family atmosphere offered through typical Cretan hospitality, we are conveniently situated just 300 metres from the sandy beach and 4 km west from the city centre. For ease of travel, our studios are 9 km from Souda Port and 19 km from Chania Airport. All accommodation is modern and well-equipped, including a large balcony with a beautiful view. In a short distance from the studios, there are also many taverns (Greek-style restaurants), supermarkets and a variety of shops. Activities nearby include horse-riding, tennis, water sports and a water park. The intense nightlife of the city centre is enhanced by the variety of clubs and discos on offer.

name: Alianthos Suites
description: Located just 100 metres from Tarsanas sandy beach, Alianthos Suites offers self-catered units built within a beautiful garden. It has a swimming pool and a private bay overlooking the Cretan Sea. Alianthos features spacious, tastefully decorated rooms with balconies or verandas enjoying sea or garden views. They all have a well equipped kitchen with dining area. Other in-room facilities include air conditioning, satellite TV and safety box. At the swimming pool area, surrounded by the hotel’s gardens, guests can find sun loungers and umbrellas. There is also a pool bar serving snacks and refreshing beverages. The more active guests will find a tennis court located right next to the sea. Alianthos Suites also features a children’s playground and BBQ facilities. Alianthos hotel offers Wi-Fi access and free private on-site parking. Chania airport is a 10-minute drive away and Souda Port is a 15-minute drive. The town of Chania is at 13 km.

name: Renieris Hotel
description: Situated upon a hill in Kato Stalos is the family run Renieris Hotel. It is just 200 metres from the beach and 8 kilometres from the famous and busy city of Chania. Renieris is built amphitheatrically offering great views of the Aegean Sea, Thodorou’s island and the olive groves of Stalos. Its rooms feature air-conditioning, satellite TV and refrigerator and all en-suite rooms have private balconies. Safety box is also available and charges are applicable. Renieris Hotel has a large swimming pool with a sun terrace, as well as a smaller pool for the children. The covered pool bar offers snacks and refreshments. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel, while wired Internet is also available in public areas, and free on-site parking is also possible. In Kato Stalos you will find many restaurants, taverns and supermarkets. Hotel Renieris is also 1,5 km away from the picturesque village of Pano Stalos where you can enjoy traditional Cretan dishes.

name: Esperides Beach Hotel Apartments
description: Offering an outdoor swimming pool, Esperides Beach Hotel Apartments is located on the beach of Kato Stalos in Crete. It includes a garden, sun terrace and snack bar. Each air-conditioned apartment features free Wi-Fi, a TV with satellite channels and a seating area. The kitchenette includes a fridge and coffee machine. The bathroom comes with a bath or shower and a hairdryer. Guests can relax at the snack bar or on the sun loungers offered by the pool. Alternatively, they can visit the city of Chania with the The Archeological Museum. Esperides Hotel Apartment is 20 km from Chania International Airport. The property offers free parking on site.

name: Manias Hotel Apartments
description: Situated in Agia Marina Nea Kydonias in the Crete region, with Agia Marina Beach and Stalos Beach nearby, Manias Hotel Apartments features accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. Offering a terrace or balcony with views of the sea and mountain, the units feature air conditioning, a seating area, cable flat-screen TV and kitchenette. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also available, as well as a kettle. Guests can enjoy the rooftop pool and garden at the aparthotel. Platanias Beach is 2.2 km from Manias Hotel Apartments, while Platanias Square is 1.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Chania International, 22 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Gianthea Studios and Apt
description: Situated 160 m from Stalos Beach, Gianthea Studios and Apt offers air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. All units are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen with an oven. A fridge is also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The aparthotel offers an outdoor pool. Guests can also relax in the garden. The nearest airport is Chania International Airport, 22 km from Gianthea Studios and Apt.

name: Golden Rose Suites
description: Just 250 metres from the beach, Golden Rose is located in Kolymbari Town. It features an outdoor swimming pool. All the units offer a terrace or balcony with garden or sea views. Modernly decorated, the spacious studios and apartments are air conditioned. They come with a flat-screen satellite TV, DVD player and safety deposit box. The bathroom includes a shower and hairdryer. A Continental breakfast is prepared daily and can be enjoyed in the privacy of your room. There is an on-site snack bar. Room service is available for a variety of coffees and drinks. Guests can sit back and relax on the sun loungers that surround the swimming pool. Wi-Fi is free in public areas of the property. The hotel staff can provide information on car rentals. Golden Rose is 19 km from Chania Town. Heraklion International Airport is at a distance of 164 km. Various shops can be found 50 metres away.

name: Divani Corfu Palace
description: Built among lush greenery in Kanoni Peninsula and just 3 km from the centre of Corfu Town, the 4-star Divani Corfu Palace features a swimming pool with hot tub. Breakfast is served on a terrace overlooking the bay. Free WiFi is available in all areas. Opening to a balcony with lagoon or garden views, the air-conditioned rooms and suites at Divani Corfu Palace have modern furnishings in earthy colours. Each unit includes flat-screen TV, a minibar and a bathroom with a bath, hairdryer and free toiletries. Some units also have a separate lounge area. The main restaurant serves Greek and international cuisine for lunch and dinner. Featuring sunset views, the Laguna Pool Restaurant is ideal for snacks or drinks. A children’s pool and a playground are available for younger guests. A well-equipped fitness centre is also provided. Corfu International Airport is 2 km away and scenic Palaiokastritsa is at 25 km. Corfu Town with the Venetian Fortress is within a distance of 3 km, and Achilleion Palace is 5 km from the property. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: King Minos Retreat Resort & Spa
description: Perched amphitheatrically on the verdant hillside, KING MINOS RETREAT Resort & Spa, proud member of the GOLDEN Hotels & Resorts, enjoys unobstructed sea views. The charming 5-star hotel in Hersonissos consists of a main building with Classic Rooms and Suites as well as a number of bungalows with private pools and outdoor Jacuzzis, scattered throughout the colorful gardens. Built according to the Cretan style and architecture, KING MINOS RETREAT Resort & Spa offers a great array of facilities and services for everyone to enjoy, welcoming guests to experience the authentic essence of the renowned Cretan Philoxenia to the fullest.

name: Pela Mare Hotel
description: Pela Mare Hotel is conveniently located in the popular Gazi area. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. All the necessary facilities, including free Wi-Fi in all rooms, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, room service, are at hand. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like closet, towels, fireplace, separate living room, television LCD/plasma screen. Enjoy the hotel's recreational facilities, including outdoor pool, diving, pool (kids), garden, before retiring to your room for a well-deserved rest. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that Crete Island has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Pela Mare Hotel.Agoda

name: Elmi Suites Beach Hotel
description: Peacefully situated just 10 metres from the sandy beach, the seafront Elmi Suites Beach Hotel features 4 freshwater pools. Guests enjoy free access to the on-site gym and free WiFi. Modernly decorated, all suites at Elmi come complete with a hairdryer and satellite TV. Air conditioning comes standard. Buffet-style delicacies and dishes are served at the main restaurant throughout the day. Drinks and refreshments, as well as a lighter fare are available at the pool bar. Free sun loungers and umbrellas are available around the pool. Relaxing options such as a sauna, steam bath and hot tub, and massage rooms are provided upon charge. The multilingual reception staff are on hand 24/7, and will be happy to assist you with travel information and car or bike rentals. The lively centre of Hersonissos Town is 700 metres away and Malia Village is 7 km away. Heraklion International Airport is at a distance of 27 km.

name: Elounda Peninsula All Suite Hotel
description: Overlooking the Bay of Elounda, Elounda Peninsula All Suite Hotel is set on a peninsular stretch of land, with a view of Mirabello Bay and the Aegean Sea. It features elegantly decorated accommodation opening to a balcony or terrace with sea views. Offering a living room, all air-conditioned suites and villas come with a minibar. Some units are fitted with luxurious bathrooms with steam bath, while most have a private and individually heated pool. An American-style, a la carte breakfast can be enjoyed, whilst watching views of the bay. The awarded Calypso restaurant prepares gourmet dishes by the pool, while a selection of Greek and international wine labels are available at "Kellari" wine cellar. The "Koh" Pan-Asian restaurant, located just above sea level at the very tip of the peninsula, serves Asian cuisine. Guests will find an outdoor swimming pool with free sun beds and umbrellas, paddling pool and care centre for children. A private sandy beach with beach service, as well as water-sport facilities and tennis courts are offered. A 50-seat cinema features private screenings of films. Located at the sister property, the exclusive Six Senses Spa is equipped with an authentic Turkish bath, where guests can experience holistic treatments and therapies. The seaside Agios Nikolaos Town is 10 km away and Heraklion City is at a distance of 70 km. Nikos Kazantzakis International Airport is 68 km away. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Domes of Elounda,Autograph Collection
description: Overlooking turqoise waters with stunning views of the castle on Spinalonga Isle, Domes of Elounda, Suites and Villas - only, Luxury Resort captures the essence of Crete with an enchanting demeanour, finely tuned service and defining architecture. At night, our community gather at CORE, the open air, ancient Greek style agora, that blends pop-up shopping with street food, socializing, art and a unique lineup of events. Four restaurants with stellar ambience, fuse what’s local with what’s timeless to create what’s next. Montessori inspired Kids and Teen zones with fun filled activities, allow ample me time for parents to recharge in adult - only areas. Soma Spa offers renewal and outdoor connection through indigenous ritual. Βοοκ the Haute Living Selection for premium luxury, where all-inclusive becomes all exclusive. For those who seek tasteful, thoughtfully curated experiences Domes of Elounda Luxury Family Resort is ideal for bonding with loved ones and creating lifelong collective memories.Marriott

name: Porto Elounda Golf & Spa Resort
description: The 5-star Porto Elounda Golf & Spa Resort, Six Senses Spa is situated along the coast of Elounda. All rooms have views of Mirabello Bay. Guests can play golf or tennis on site, or relax at the awarded Six Senses Spa. The airy rooms have wooden floors and a sea-view veranda with teak furniture and blooming plants. Equipment includes an LDC TV with satellite and cable channels, and a furnished seating area. Porto Elounda offers the first Six Senses Spa™ in Europe, with holistic treatments, covering an area of 2,200 m². Facilities include a heated freshwater indoor pool, sauna and steam room. The 9-hole golf course is available to resort guests only. The hotel’s water sports centre includes jet-skis, wind surfing, water ski and sailing. Luxury yachts are available, as well as a PADI certified scuba diving centre. There is also a playground for infants and kids with a variety of learning activities. Breakfast and dinner are served at the sea-view Nafsika Restaurant. You can choose to have lunch at Aglio e Olio serving Italian cuisine, or the beachfront tavern Odysseus. The Porto Elounda Golf & Spa Resort is 70 km away from Heraklion International Airport. The hotel's helicopter-pad allows direct transfers from Athens or Heraklion. Transportation within the hotel is possible.

name: Porto Platanias Beach Resort & Spa
description: Nestled in lush green and offering a spectacular view of the Cretan Sea and the island of Agii Theodori, Porto Platanias Beach Resort & Spa features 3 restaurants, 5 bars and 5 large swimming pools. Built on a sublime area of 30,000 square metres, right next to the sea, the 5-star Porto Platanias boasts a health and fitness centre, pampering guests with an indoor heated pool, sauna, steam bath, hot tub and therapeutic massages. The elegant rooms at Porto Platanias meet the highest aesthetic standards. All rooms are fully equipped and have balcony with sea, pool or garden views. Porto Platanias Beach Resort is located in one of the most cosmopolitan areas of Crete, Platanias, 9km west of the city of Chania, and 20km from the Chania airport.

name: Atlantis Beach Hotel
description: This 5-star Rethymnon Beach hotel has a Blue Flag sandy beach, equipped with loungers and parasols. Atlantis Beach Hotel offers rooms with balconies, large gardens and a 170-m² swimming pool. The air-conditioned rooms have free WiFi, LCD satellite TV with 25 foreign channels and 1 Greek news channel, and a fridge. Their balconies offer sea or pool view. All rooms overlook the beautiful hotel gardens. Knossos restaurant serves Greek and Cretan cuisine. The lobby bar serves drinks in a beautiful atmosphere with views of the sea. Both the beach and the pool areas are serviced by the lobby and pool bars. The hotel offers free sun beds and umbrellas around the pools. Relaxing facilities at the Atlantis include a fitness room and a sauna. It also features a children’s playground and a games room. Atlantis Beach Hotel is located on the sandy beach of Rethymno, 1.5 km from the old town and the Venetian harbour. Private parking is available in hotel's garage with extra cost.

name: Bella Beach Hotel
description: Lying on the sandy beach of Anissaras, the 5-star Bella Beach offers elegant accommodation with views over the Cretan Sea or the complex’s well-kept gardens. It includes 2 swimming pools, 2 restaurants and offers extended wellness facilities. The air-conditioned rooms at Bella Beach are decorated in light olive-green tones and open out to a private balcony. They are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, DVD player, mini fridge, free toiletries and hairdryer. Free WiFi is available and safety boxes are provided upon charge. Pergola Restaurant serves breakfast, lunch and dinner in buffet style, while Olive Tree Restaurant prepares Mediterranean dishes a la carte. The 3 bars, on the lobby, the beach and by the pool, are ideal for enjoying an exotic cocktail while overlooking the sea. Guests can pamper themselves at the on-site spa centre including an indoor pool, a hot tub and a hammam. The property also features a variety of sports facilities, such as 2 tennis courts, a mini-golf course and a basketball court. The lively town of Hersonissos with its many nightlife options is around 4 km from the resort. Nikos Kazantzakis International Airport is at 25 km. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Koutrakis Suites by Estia
description: Located in Sissi, Koutrakis Suites by Estia offers accommodation with a shared swimming pool. All suites come with a living area and flat-screen, satellite TV. A mini fridge, electric kettle and minibar are also provided. There is room service at the property. Heraklio Town is 45 km from Koutrakis Suites by Estia, while Hersonissos is 20 km away. The nearest airport is Heraklion International Airport, 40 km from the property.

name: Theo Star Beach Hotel
description: Situated just a few metres from the beach of Malia, Theodosis Apartments offers self-catering accommodation with views to the large garden and the Cretan Sea. Studios and apartments in Theodosis are spacious and tastefully furnished. Each unit comes with a kitchen or kitchenette with dining area. Facilities include a TV, air conditioning and safe. All rooms also have a balcony. The bustling town of Hersonissos offering many dining and nightlife options is 10 km away. Theodosis offers free Wi-Fi in its public areas and free private parking on site.

name: Rethymno Mare Royal & Water Park
description: Just a few metres from Skaleta Beach, Rethymno Mare Royal features a pool with a sun terrace, a bar and a restaurant. Covering a lush 35.000-m2 area, the property also includes a tennis court, a mini market, 2 coference rooms and a games room with billiards. All rooms and suites of Mare Royal open to a balcony overlooking the pool and the Cretan Sea. Fitted with marbled floors and warm colours, each air-conditioned unit features a fridge, a safe and a Samsung Smart IP TV 43". The private bathroom is stocked with bathrobes, slippers and a hairdryer. Guests can start their day with a buffet breakfast with local specialities served daily at Dionysos Restaurant. Drinks and coffees can be enjoyed at the pool bar or the beach bar, while Mediterranean flavours are served at the restaurant. Themed nights with live music are also scheduled regularly. Children can swim safely in their own pool, while there is also animation program, kids’ buffet and a mini club. Sun beds and umbrellas are available by the pool and on the beach. Other facilities include table tennis, darts, volleyball, water polo, boccia. Massage treatments can be arranged upon request, while room service is also available. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can provide car rental and ticket services. Free WiFi is available throughout. Rethymno Mare Royal lies within 11 km from Rethymno Town and Port and 65 km from Heraklion City. The seaside Bali Village with its sandy beach is at 21 km. Free parking is possible on site.

name: Palazzo Vecchio Exclusive Residence
address: Iroon Politechniou, Ioannou Melissinou &, Rethymno 741, Rethymno
description: Built in the 15th century, the Palazzo Vecchio Exclusive Residence is an authentic Venetian mansion and one of the oldest of Rethymnon. It is situated in a quiet location, below the Venetian Fortress and just 50 metres from the sea. Restored with taste and respect to the local history and aesthetics, the Palazzo Vecchio offers luxurious suites, junior suites and maisonettes. Featuring Coco-Mat beds and mattresses, all units include free WiFi. The formation of the internal areas, the furnishings, the cobbled courtyard and the small pool all fully accord with the aesthetic commands of the same artistic tradition. Guests will find restaurants, café-bars and shops all within a short walking distance from Palazzo Vecchio Exclusive Residence. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Dedalos Hotel
description: Set in Malia, less than 1 km from Central Malia Beach, Dedalos Hotel offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides a concierge service, a tour desk and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel, all rooms include a desk, bed linen and a balcony with a garden view. Each room comes with a safety deposit box and certain rooms also offer pool views. All guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Speaking German, Greek, English and Spanish at the reception, staff are willing to help at any time of the day. Ikaros and Kernos Beach is 2 km from Dedalos Hotel, while Alexander Beach is 2.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Heraklion International, 29 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Sunny Bay Hotel
description: On the beachfront of Kissamos, Sunny Bay Hotel Hotel offers accommodation with sea or pool views, traditional Cretan cuisine and free WiFi throughout. Kissamos centre is just a short stroll away. Sunny Bay Hotel’s restaurant serves an extensive buffet of local and international dishes during breakfast and dinner. The indoor and pool bars are perfect for drinks. Staff can provide beach umbrellas or arrange bicycle rental. Sunny Bay Hotel features a games area with table tennis and billiards. An on-site store is available for necessities. Each air-conditioned room includes a private balcony with outdoor seating area. Rooms also feature satellite TVs and well-stocked mini bars. Famous Falassarna beach is just 15 km away and the archaeological site of Polyrinia is only a 10-minute drive. Chania Airport is 50 km away.

name: Almyrida Resort
description: Centrally located in Almyrida Town and by the beach, The Almyrida Resort consists of four hotels, the Almyrida Beach Hotel, the Almyrida Residence Hotel, the Almyrida Studios Hotel and the Almyrida Gardens. In our premises you can find 4 outdoor pools, a fitness center, a spa, an infinity adults only pool in our Roof Garden. All rooms offer a balcony with view either to the Sea, or to the mountains. Certified Greek breakfast is served in the morning. Equipped with free Wi-Fi, the units come with air conditioning, flat-screen satellite TV, mini fridge and safety deposit box. Some include a spa bath, separate rooms, or DVD player. Greek breakfast at Almyrida Resort includes among others local delicacies. The on-site bar offers beverages, cocktails, ice creams and snacks. The à la carte Restaurant Thea serves Cretan and European fine dinining dishes on the rooftop garden. Various restaurants, cafés and a beach are close to the Almyrida. It is 25 km from Chania city and 30 km from Chania Airport.

name: I Resort Beach Hotel & Spa
description: Situated right on the sandy beach of Stalida, the 5-star I- Resort Beach Hotel offers elegantly decorated rooms. It includes a spa centre and 2 restaurants. The air-conditioned rooms of I- Resort Beach Hotel Lounge feature parquet floors and light wood furnishings. They come with a satellite LCD TV, minibar and hairdryer. All rooms have balconies, while most of them enjoy Cretan Sea views. The 2 pools have wooden decks with free sun loungers and umbrellas. Facilities include 2 restaurants, as well as 2 bars, the main and the pool bar. I- Resort Beach Hotel is a few minutes’ walk from the centre of Stalida. Heraklion airport is at 35 km. Free private on-site parking is available. There is no ATM on the property but nearby.

name: Pleasure Beach Hotel
description: Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, Pleasure Beach Hotel offers accommodation in Mália. Free private parking is available on site. Rooms come with a flat-screen TV. Certain rooms feature a seating area for your convenience. Certain units have views of the sea or garden. All rooms have a private bathroom. There is a shared lounge, a tour desk, luggage storage space and hairdresser's at the property. Heraklio Town is 30 km from Pleasure Beach Hotel, while Hersonissos is 7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Heraklion International Airport, 26 km from the property.

name: Sapphire Horizon Suites
description: Sapphire Horizon Suites has a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, a snack bar and shared lounge in Kissamos. Among the facilities at this property are a concierge service and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property offers car hire and features a garden and terrace. The rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a fridge, an oven, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. At the hotel rooms have a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Mavros Molos Beach is 1.1 km from the accommodation, while Kissamos / Kasteli Port is 3.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Chania International, 44 km from Sapphire Horizon Suites, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Ledra Maleme Hotel
description: Just 150 metres from the beach, the traditionally built Ledra Maleme Hotel offers a swimming pool, poolside bar and Cretan restaurant. It features air-conditioned studios with free Wi-Fi and views of the sea or the garden. Studios at Ledra Maleme Hotel feature a kitchenette with cooking facilities, fridge and a coffee machine. Each unit has a flat-screen TV. Some of the studios have a balcony. Kids can play in the children's pool or have fun in the playground. Table tennis facilities are also provided. Platanias is just a 5-minute drive away. Souda Airport is located 26 km away. The property offers free private parking.

name: Alianthos Garden
description: Alianthos Garden Hotel is a family-run complex, situated just 50 metres opposite the wonderful beach of Plakias, in Rethymno area. It offers free Wi-Fi access and free private on-site parking. Located just few minutes’ walk from the shops and tavernas of the village, the overall tone at the Alianthos Hotel is informal and truly perfect for relaxing. The renovated guest rooms and apartments of Hotel Alianthos Garden are well-equipped and offer comfortable beds with orthosomatic mattresses by Cocomat as well as a pillow menu. They all feature balconies with panoramic views of the surrounding area. Guests at the Alianthos Garden Hotel may enjoy exotic cocktails at the bar, or the sun by the large fresh water swimming pool.

name: Mitsis Grand Hotel Beach Hotel
description: This beachfront hotel enjoys a privileged location, just a 15-minute walk outside Rhodes’ Old Town. Guests enjoy 3 swimming pools, sports facilities and luxurious rooms with sea or garden views. Free WiFi is available in all areas. The Mitsis Grand Hotel Beach Hotel’s rooms are air conditioned and feature a spacious bathroom with bathtub and satellite TV with international channels. They are decorated in warm colours and feature elegant wooden furniture. Most rooms offer a breathtaking view over the sea. Guests of the Mitsis Grand Hotel Beach Hotel can enjoy the 2 outdoor sea-water swimming pools and the pebbled beach in front of the hotel. Sun beds & umbrellas are at the guests' disposal by the pool. A bridge room, fitness centre, as well as a floodlit tennis court are available. More exciting activities, such as windsurfing, and catamaran sailing are available at the nearby water-sports centre. The Grand’s dining pallet includes a Chinese, a Greek, a Mexican and an Italian restaurant. There is also a restaurant serving a great variety of juicy burgers. Crepes and ice creams can be enjoyed at the on-site creperie-gelateria, while delicious pizzas are served at the Pizza Oven. Fine cuisine is proposed at the hotel's buffet restaurant. Refreshments and cocktails can be enjoyed at the main bar and at the pool bar.

name: Dionysos Hotel
description: Dionysos Hotel is set in a blooming tropical garden, amongst pine and olive trees, with bars and restaurants surrounding its water lake pool. Loungers and umbrellas are complimentary. Ixia Beach is 200 metres from the hotel. Accommodation at Hotel Dionysos is spacious and air-conditioned and includes en suite bathroom with bathtub and hairdryer. Each room offers a balcony or terrace with view of the sea or the gardens and pool. The enriched American breakfast buffet includes on-spot cooking stations. Mediterranean and Greek dishes are served at the main and poolside restaurant. There is also a Souvlaki - Kebab corner, a Creperie and a pastry shop. Children are entertained at the children’s pool and the playground. Greek evenings with live music and shows are frequently hosted. Free WiFi is provided in all areas. Rhodes Town is 3.6 km from Dionysos Hotel. The nearest airport is Rhodes International Airport, 10 km from the property. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Akti Imperial Deluxe Resort & Spa
description: Providing free WiFi, Akti Imperial Deluxe Resort & Spa is located in Ixia. The hotel provides a spa experience, with its hot tub, sauna and fitness centre. Guests can make use of a private beach area. Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. All rooms come with a private bathroom, free toiletries and a balcony. At Akti Imperial Deluxe Resort & Spa rooms come with a seating area. The accommodation offers a buffet or gluten-free breakfast. At Akti Imperial Deluxe Resort & Spa you will find Asian Restaurant. The hotel offers 4 outdoor swimming pools. You can play tennis at this 5-star hotel. With staff speaking German, English and French, round-the-clock guidance is available at the reception. Rhodes Town is 4 km from Akti Imperial Deluxe Resort & Spa, while Faliraki is 9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Rhodes International Airport, 9 km from the property.

name: Kastelli Hotel
description: Just a 5-minute walk from the centre of Afandou village in Rhodes, Kastelli Hotel, Afandou offers a swimming pool, a snack bar and daily breakfast. Afandou Beach is 2 km away. Rooms at Hotel Kastelli include a private balcony. Each has a private bathroom with shower and amenities. There are lots of free sun loungers and umbrellas in the pool area. The pool bar serves drinks and snacks until late in the evening. Special meals, such as traditional Greek dishes, can be provided upon request. Nearby Afanou Beach has water sports facilities such as windsurfing. The Old Town of Rhodes is at 18 km and Rhodes International Airport is 23 km away. Staff at the tour desk can arrange car rental and free private parking is available on site.

name: Belair Beach Hotel
description: Just steps away from the beach on the bay of Ixia, Belair Beach Hotel provides a family-friendly atmosphere with a variety of leisure activities and close to the local tavernas. Belair Beach Hotel enjoys a prime location in Ixia, close to the beautiful beach and main attractions. Combining modern amenities with a relaxed family atmosphere, Belair Beach is an ideal base for families and couples. Benefit from a complimentary buffet breakfast every day and free private parking during your stay. Relax by the spacious outdoor pool or enjoy a game of tennis or mini golf in Belair Hotel’s garden. Just across the road from Belair Beach, you can find plenty of water sport activities, including windsurfing and jet skiing. There are also plenty of bars and restaurants surrounding Belair Beach Hotel.

name: Rodos Palace Hotel
description: Set in a wonderful Aegean setting, the luxurious Rodos Palace offers a wide variety of suites and exceptionally stylish accommodation, and boasts 5 outdoor pools, and 4 restaurants, bar and lounges. Spread around the resort, there are 14 picturesque blocks with garden suites. They are spacious, superbly designed and are ideal for couples and families looking for privacy and a series of exclusive facilities, including private pools. Each unit has free WiFi access and is equipped with a Smart TV with satellite channels. On the top floors of the 20-storey Tower, the redesigned rooms and suites are uniquely decorated and come with modern amenities. Next to the Rodos Palace Hotel Tower, you will find the Executive VIP Wing. They both offer accommodation that combines stylish décor, state-of-the-art equipment and beautiful sea views. Rodos Palace guests enjoy a great array of dining options, including both indoor and outdoor restaurants serving excellent Greek and European cuisine. Within a short distance of the resort, you can enjoy activities such as horse riding, golf in an 18-hole championship court and yachting. A variety of experiences has been organised in packages for guests who wish to further explore the island. A beach accessible to people with mobility issues is just 50 metres away. Rodos Palace is only 500 metres from the long, sandy Ialyssos beach, with the perfectly preserved Rhodes Old Town only a short drive away.

name: 7Palms
description: Featuring an outdoor pool and a stone-paved terrace, 7Palms is quietly located outside the touristic part of Rhodes and at the same time within walking distance of the Medieval City of Rhodes. It offers spacious studios and apartments with free WiFi and a private balcony. The city centre of Rhodes is 1.5 km away. Fitted with parquet floors, dark-wooden furnishings and some antique items, each air-conditioned, self-catering unit of 7Palms provides a well-equipped kitchen and 1 or 2 separate bedrooms. The accommodation is finished with a spacious and modern bathroom. Just a short walk from 7 Palms, guests can reach the city's important sites, such as the ancient stadium and the Temple of Apollo. A variety of restaurants, shops and cafes can be found within walking distance. Diagoras International Airport is 20 km away.

name: Sheraton Rhodes Resort
description: Rhodes, a city with a 2400 year history, the place that gave birth to legends and hosted significant personalities of politics, the arts and culture, with a beauty that enthralled its conquerors through the centuries, hosts the welcoming Sheraton Rhodes Resort. Our 5-star hotel is cocooned in the beauty of its attractive lush gardens with the blue expanse of the pristine waters in front of its private beach, is ideally situated in a key spot in Ixia, just 4 kilometres from the famous Medieval Town of Rhodes, the best preserved Medieval City in the world and an UNESCO World Heritage Monument. Our family friendly resort encompasses in its grounds and services the very things that Rhodes offers natural beauty, unique architecture, a variety of entertainment options, modern infrastructure and traditional hospitality.Marriott

name: Rose Hotel Faliraki
description: The family-run Rose Hotel Faliraki features an outdoor swimming pool surrounded by sun loungers and umbrellas. It provides a snack bar, BBQ facilities and studios with a balcony or terrace. A private bathroom is standard in all the units at Rose Hotel Faliraki. Each includes a kitchenette with cooking hobs, fridge and kitchenware. Some are interconnecting rooms, while others overlook the pool. Kids can play in the paddling pool and playground. Car and bike rentals can be arranged by the 24-hour reception. Free Wi-Fi access is available in public areas of the property. Rose Hotel Faliraki is 16 km from Diagoras Airport. Various supermarkets and shops are located nearby.

name: Filoxenia Apartments & Studios
description: Just 300 metres from the beach of Theologos in Rhodes, Filoxenia Apartments & Studios features 2 swimming pools and a Greek restaurant. It features self-catered accommodation with a balcony overlooking the gardens, the sea and the pools. A kitchenette with cooking facilities and fridge are included in all accommodation types at the Filoxenia. Each has a private bathroom with shower. Some units have a separate bedroom, and an extra bathroom. Air conditioning and safety box are provided upon charge. A la carte breakfast can be enjoyed daily at the dining area. Cocktails and coffee are served at the poolside bar. Lunch and dinner include family recipes made with local produce, such as spoon sweets and homemade liqueurs. Free sun loungers are provided on the terrace. Leisure options include petanque, mini golf and table tennis facilities. Younger guests can enjoy the playground and children’s pool. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Staff can arrange car rental to explore the Butterfly Valley 6 km away. Rhodes Town is 18 km away. Rhodes International Airport is within 5 km. Free private parking is possible on site and a bus stops right outside the property.

name: All Senses Ocean Blue Sea Side Resort
description: Located in Ialysos, The Ocean Blue Hotel is a perfect starting point from which to explore Rhodes. The property has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at The Ocean Blue Hotel. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at The Ocean Blue Hotel.Agoda

name: Valsami Hotel Apartments
description: Valsami Hotel Apartments features a pool, a poolside bar and a restaurant amidst its blossomed garden. It also includes a mini market, a gift shop and a games room with billiards. All air-conditioned apartments of Valsami open out to a furnished balcony or patio overlooking the pool or the garden. Each unit features a kitchenette with fridge and a private bathroom stocked with a hairdryer and free toiletries. A TV with satellite channels is also available. Guests can relax at the sun loungers by the pool and enjoy a cold coffee or a fresh juice at the poolside bar. Light meals and drinks are available at the snack bar, while Mediterranean dishes are also served at the on-site restaurant. Valsami Hotel Apartments lies within 6 km from Rhodes International Airport and 7 km from Rhodes Town. The famous Valley of Butterflies is at 18 km, while the lively Faliraki is 18 km away. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Lindian Village Beach Resort, Curio Collection By Hilton
description: Our Lardos Beach resort features native gardens and a private beach. Outdoor spaces highlight Rhodian-style rooms, some have private pools. Enjoy local, Asian, and Italian cuisines, spa treatments, and wellness activities. We’re five kilometers from a nature reserve, and The Medieval City of Rhodes, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is an hour away.Hilton

name: Athineon Hotel
description: Athineon Hotel is a popular choice amongst travelers in Rhodes, whether exploring or just passing through. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, express check-in/check-out, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find television LCD/plasma screen, internet access wireless, internet access wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning. Entertain the hotel's recreational facilities, including fitness center, outdoor pool, kids club, pool (kids), garden. Athineon Hotel combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Rhodes unforgettable.priceline.com
